programme.title: Kergejõustikusajand
programme.desc: Eesti kergejõustiklased on möödunud sajandi vältel võitnud hulgaliselt tiitlivõistluste medaleid kuni olümpiakuldadeni välja. Kolmas osa toob vaatajani meie väljakualade suurimad nimed ja nende lood.

programme.title: Mississippi hääled
programme.desc: Sarja viiendas osas jõuame Nachezi nimelisse linna. Otsime kunagise kindrali ja tulevase presidendi lippu ja laseme end õhtuses baaris karaoke-maavõistlusesse tõmmata. Seejärel sõidame Vicksburgi, kus külastame sealset lahinguvälja ja suurt soomuslaeva. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ, operaator, režissöör ja monteerija Väino Laisaar, produtsent Herbert Murd, koordinaator Kaisa Ling, sarja muusika Madis Aesma.

programme.title: See teeb haiget
programme.desc: Noor arst Adam püüab vahelduva eduga jagada oma aega töö ja eraelu vahel. Seekord kannatab kindlasti eraelu, kuid kogu selle kaose keskel teeb ta tööl suure vea.

programme.title: See teeb haiget
programme.desc: Adam ei suuda unustada enneaegselt sündinud last, ta tööpinged avalduvad ka eraelus. Haiglas on ta muutunud üliettevaatlikuks ja jälgib teiste pilgetest hoolimata oma instinkte.

programme.title: Lendavad soomlased
programme.desc: Ralli on ohtlik spordiala. Kuidas toime tulla, kui meeskonnakaaslane sureb või oled ise sattunud raskesse õnnetusse? Selles dokumentaalsarjas kuuleme unikaalseid lugusid rallimaailmas toimunust. Soome rallilegendid räägivad sõidu- ja võidujanust, kiirusest ning surma lähedusest, hetkedest, mil oldi tipus või käidi ära põhjas. Sarja esimeses osas räägivad Marcus Grönholm, Tommi Mäkinen, Juha Kankkunen, Markku Alén ja teised ralliässad sellest, kuidas sünnivad meistrid. Milliseid omadusi on vaja, et tulla ralli maailmameistriks?(n)

programme.title: Vere taga
Behind the Blood
programme.desc: San Pedro Sula, Honduras, on üks maailma ohtlikumaid linnu, kus mõrvu ei pane toime üksnes narkokartellid, vaid ka politsei ja armee. Preester ja mööblimeister Daniel Pacheco püüab elusid päästa, kuid tapmisi on liiga palju. Mõrvad on teleajakirjanik Orlin Castro igapäevane leib, kuid temagi unistab rahulikumast elust. Palgamõrvar Matathan kõneleb avameelselt oma tööst, ent ka tema on küllalt saanud. Hollandi-Ameerika filmirežissöör, Hondurases sündinud Loretta van der Horst toob nende kolme tegelase kaudu häirivalt lähedale jahmatava vägivalla, mida keegi ei suuda lõpetada.(n)

programme.title: Eesti mäng
programme.desc: Finaalis on vastamisi kolme poolfinaali võitjad. See, kes vastab esimesena õigesti viimasele küsimusele, viib koju peaauhinna ja sõidab suurele Pärnumaa avastusretkele. Saatejuht Gaute Kivistik, režissöör Maire Radsin.(n)

programme.title: Pulss
programme.desc: Ilmari saab hoiatuse ravivea pärast. Johanna märkab, et on sattunud musta nimekirja ning arstide ringkaitse mõistab teda sügavalt hukka. Haavunud Max otsib võimalusi Ellale kätte maksta. Santtu läheb Ilmari eeskujul tööle dokumentideta isikute kliinikusse, kus neid ootab ees ootamatu kohtumine. Haiglasse tuuakse Downi sündroomiga abielupaar ning naine kurdab kõhuvalu. Selgub, et valu põhjuseks pole siiski teps mitte pimesool.(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Bonni ja Claude on vanapaar, kes tuleb Džungliässade juurde murega: nad ei suuda meenutada, kuhu nad aastaid tagasi oma varanduse peitsid. Batricia ja Gilbert on lahkelt valmis paarikest aitama, kuid peagi tekib kahtlus, kas armsad rotikesed ongi nii armsad, nagu nad püüavad näidata...(n)

programme.desc: Printsess Lululeluule tervitab meid hindi keeles, sest ta tuli Lastetuppa just ühest India muinasjuttude raamatust ja nii mängib ta koos Timmuga loo printsess Damajantist. Stsenarist Silvia Soro, mängivad Jaune Kimmel ja Mart Kampus.(n)

programme.title: Peetrikese unenägu
programme.desc: Ühel hommikul leiab Peetrike, et ta on maailmas täiesti üksi. Ta hakkab vallatust tegema ja satub pööraste tempude tõttu väga täbarasse olukorda. Viimaks selgub, et see kõik oli üksnes halb unenägu. Esimene eesti nukufilm. Režissöör Elbert Tuganov, operaator Aimée Beekman, kunstnik Rein Raamat, helilooja Boris Kõrver.(n)

programme.title: Klaabu kosmoses
programme.desc: Film Klaabu seiklustest viib vaataja tundmatule planeedile, kus Klaabu koos sõpradega aitab põliselanikel vabaneda kõikeõgivast Seenest. Helilooja Sven Grünberg, kunstnik Mati Kütt, operaator Janno Põldma, režissöör Avo Paistik, stsenaristid Enn Vetemaa ja Avo Paistik.(n)

programme.title: Eesti mäng
programme.desc: Üheksanda hooaja avasaates astuvad üles koorijuht Hirvo Surva, dirigent ja laulja Valter Soosalu ning helilooja ja dirigent Rasmus Puur. Saatejuht Gaute Kivistik, režissöör Maire Radsin, assistent Britt Kõrsmaa, küsimused Tiit Naarits, toimetajad Christel Karits ja Anne Mäns, produtsendid Maarek Toompere, Tarmo Kiviväli (ThorsFilms), Age Kraus (ERR).(n)

programme.title: Pulss
programme.desc: Johanna tajub arstide poolt aina kasvavat vaenu ja vastasseisu. Jarmo teeb Lenitale ootamatu üllatuse, kuid Lenita on kõhklev ja muretseb oma haiguse pärast. Ootamatult lapse saanud Downi sündroomiga paar peab harjutama beebiga toimetulemist.(n)

programme.title: Tallinn täis muusikat
programme.desc: Tallinn kannab UNESCO muusikalinna uhket tiitlit ja see annab muusikale linnaruumis erilise tähenduse. Kadri Voorand, Sissi Nylia Benita, Rasmus Puur, Kristjan Järvi, Andres Kõpper ja Sven Grünberg viivad meid pealinna märgilistesse paikadesse ning avavad oma inspiratsiooniallikad.(n)

programme.title: Lendavad soomlased
programme.desc: Ralli on suurte panustega mäng. Ühel päeval ülistatakse sind kui kangelast, järgmisel päeval kuulutatakse luuseriks. Kuidas peab pingetega toime tulema? Räägib endine tippsõitja ja praegune meeskonnajuht Jari-Matti Latvala.(n)

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu
programme.desc: Saatesari "Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu" teine hooaeg keskendub nüüdki päevakajalistele kultuuriteemadele. Lahkame probleeme ning otsime muredele lahendusi tuues teoreetikud ja praktikud kokku. Saatejuhid on Maarja Vaino, Tarmo Tiisler ja Kaupo Meiel. Režissöör Andres Lepasar.(n)

programme.title: Une mõistatused
Mysteries of Sleep
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilmis "Une mõistatused" piiluvad teadlased ajju, et näha, mis seal sellel näiliselt tegevusetul öisel perioodil toimub ja uurida välja, kui oluline mõju on magamisel mälu toimimisele, traumade salvestumisele ning emotsioonide reguleerimisele.(n)

programme.title: Conni ja sõbrad
Conni & Co
programme.desc: 12-aastasel Connil läheb uues koolis seitsmenda klassi algus raskelt. Asjaolu, et ta peab oma koera Frodo ära andma, ei muuda elu lihtsamaks. Frodo omanik on julm direktor Möller, kes ei tee ainult oma õpilaste elu põrguks. Kui Conni ja tema sõbrad märkavad, et Möller on lisaks kuri loomapiinaja, asuvad nad Frodot päästma ning Conni ja sõbrad sukelduvad julgelt ning nutikalt põnevatesse ja lõbusatesse seiklustesse.(n)

programme.desc: KIrbu-Krants on üks haisev krants, kes elab prügikastis koos oma sõbra, lapiku Kilu-Liisuga. Tema unistuseks on leida endale peremees. Eesti keeles on kirjastuses Draakon ja Kuu seni ilmunud kolm "Kirbu-Krantsi" raamatut, kõik Indrek Koffi tõlkes. Esimeses osas satub ta saksa lambakoera Rexi asemel öövalvuri ametit pidama ja keerab kokku paraja segaduse.(n)

programme.desc: Piraaditar ja Capitano korraldavad omavahel võistluse, kumb kiiremini Tindikale paki kohale toimetab.(n)

Portable portals
programme.desc: Morph'i mustad augud ajavad Chas'i segadusse.(n)

programme.title: Kergejõustikusajand
programme.desc: Eesti kergejõustiklased on möödunud sajandi vältel võitnud hulgaliselt tiitlivõistluste medaleid kuni olümpiakuldadeni välja. 3-osalise saatesarja esimene osa tutvustab meie mitmevõistluse traditsioone ja kuulsamaid nimesid. Saate autor Kristjan Kalkun, režissöör Steiv Silm.(n)

programme.title: Laske mind Lavale
programme.desc: Hariduslik-meelelahutuslik saatesari, mis jälgib kuue noore teekonda lavale. Mis neid näitleja elukutse juures paelub, miks soovivad nad oma elu teatriga siduda ning millistest väikestest ja suurtest väljakutsetest teatritöö koosneb? Saatesarja viimane osa toob hulga üllatusi ja selgub võitja, kes viib koju auga teenitud magusa autasu. Enne ootavad noori aga viimased ülesanded, kus seekord tuleb end muuhulgas tõestada muusikali rollis! Žüriitoolidel võtavad koha sisse hõbekõrid Helgi Sallo, Priit Volmer ja Janne Ševtšenko.(n)

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A small loving family is forced to live in silence while hiding from creatures that hunt by sound.

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: To save the company's budget, a CEO, Carol Vanstone, decides to shut down the branch run by her brother, Clay. Trying to save his company, Clay throws an epic Christmas party in an attempt to win over a financially powerful, possible partner, but things spiral out of control.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In a world devastated by a global war, except for Western Europe (UFB) and Australia (the Colony), Douglas Quaid believes he is a factory worker until he discovers real memories of being a high-profile agent at UFB after visiting Rekall, a recreational company that implants false memories. A series of chases and clues reveal the plan to eliminate the Colony and only Quaid can "kill" the plan.

programme.title: Edison
programme.desc: After encountering a den of degenerate police officers, a young journalist makes partners with a reporter and an investigator, before he can fully realize the extent of the criminality around him.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: A military based engineer travels to the outer edges of the solar system to find his missing father who disappeared while on a mission in search of space life twenty years ago.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Following the closure of Jurassic World theme park, the eruption of a dormant volcano on the island makes Owen and Claire return to Isla Nublar to save the dinosaurs from extinction.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: Follows the relentless efforts of the crypto-zoological agency, as it faces off against a group of enormous monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah , leaving humanity to an unknown fate.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it in order to beat the game and return to the real world.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: When a depressed Spencer starts fiddling with the broken Jumanji game in search of purpose, his friends reenter the game to rescue him, along with his grandfather and his old friend. As they encounter a landscape ravaged by drought, they must fight to find Spencer and save Jumanji.

programme.title: The Lost City of Z
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film tells the story of British explorer Percy Fawcett who vanished back in 1925 after dedicating his life to proving that an advanced civilization had once existed in the jungles of Amazon.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it in order to beat the game and return to the real world.

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Cameron (Mark Ruffalo) is a depressed father who is addicted to alcohol, trying in various ways to regain his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana) by taking full responsibility of his young daughters. In his attempt to deal with them, participate in their daily life, and do some chores, the girls do not make this task easy for the father.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: Follows the relentless efforts of the crypto-zoological agency, as it faces off against a group of enormous monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah , leaving humanity to an unknown fate.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A young British family vacationing in Thailand is suddenly torn apart when the devastating 2004 tsunami tears through their seaside resort. Their devoted search for one another is a testament to the human spirit and the power of family.

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Two strangers are united by necessity and circumstances after their plane crashes, leaving the two stranded on a snowy mountain. As they struggle to deal with the harsh elements and their growing despair, they find strength in each other to make a difficult journey in search of rescue.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: The crew of a whaling ship faces an unexpected hurdle in the form of a giant whale that devastates the ship and leaves the crew stranded at sea. With the whale after them and no hope of rescue, the crew resorts to drastic measures in order to survive.

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: In the North Pole within dramatic events, an oil drilling team faces harsh conditions and predatory wolves after their plane crash.

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Two strangers are united by necessity and circumstances after their plane crashes, leaving the two stranded on a snowy mountain. As they struggle to deal with the harsh elements and their growing despair, they find strength in each other to make a difficult journey in search of rescue.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: In a weird twist of events, a successful businessman who has forgone his personal life for his career finds himself transported to another life, one where he never made the choice to prioritize his career and instead started a family with his college sweetheart.(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: The crew of a whaling ship faces an unexpected hurdle in the form of a giant whale that devastates the ship and leaves the crew stranded at sea. With the whale after them and no hope of rescue, the crew resorts to drastic measures in order to survive.(n)

programme.title: Moonrise Kingdom
programme.desc: Set in the sixties, in an island in New England, a 12-year-old boy and girl fall in love and secretly plan to run away together. This angers the authorities in the island, and the situation escalates to the point where they attempt to track the young couple in all directions.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: As Peter Rabbit and his sisters enjoy sneaking into Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden, things get complicated when his nephew, Thomas, moves into his house and sets out to get rid of the rabbits.(n)

programme.title: Dumplin'
programme.desc: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), is a full-bodied teenager and the daughter of a former beauty queen, who signs up in the Miss Bluebonnet Teen Pageant, revolutionizing the contest and the small Texas town.(n)

programme.title: The House of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between an isolated teen who longs to break out of his sheltered life with his grandmother, and a punk rock lover who has a heart condition. Through the music of punk rock, the two young men end up inspiring each other and changing both of their lives.(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam's intention to leave the Autobots behind in pursuit of a normal life is thwarted as an old Decepticon known as The Fallen rises, forcing Sam and his girlfriend Mikaela to delve into the history of the Transformers on Earth to find a way to defeat The Fallen.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: (Roxie Hart ) and (Velma Kelly) each commit a murder; Roxie killed her boyfriend , and Velma killed her husband and sister. The two women grab the attention of the Chicago media,that love scandals. They both share the same lawyer (Billy Flynn) who tries to acquit them of their charges.

programme.title: Race
programme.desc: The film follows the story of the African-American track and field athlete Jesse Owens, who was described as being the fastest man in the world, especially after his success in winning four gold medals in the 1936 Olympic Games that were held in Berlin during the period of the Nazi regime.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: Five years after Superman left Earth to investigate if Krypton is still intact, he returns to a much-changed world where his former love, Lois Lane, has moved on, and the people of Earth have decided that they do not need Superman.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: As the last son of Krypton sent to Earth, a young journalist raised by his adoptive parents finds the fate of planet Earth in his hands after an attack. From the writer of "The Dark Knight," director of "300," and producer Christopher Nolan comes this epic Superman reboot.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samurai warriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: With the aid of a technology that gives him access to his ancestors' memories through genetics, Callum takes a dive into the memories of his ancestor Aguilar, a member of the Assassins, to figure out a way to prevent the Templars from stripping people of their free will.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: The small town of Woodsboro becomes terrorized by a masked serial killer, who is targeting the teenage girl Sidney Prescott whose mother was murdered a year earlier.

programme.title: Transformers : Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: With the aid of a technology that gives him access to his ancestors' memories through genetics, Callum takes a dive into the memories of his ancestor Aguilar, a member of the Assassins, to figure out a way to prevent the Templars from stripping people of their free will.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samurai warriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: In South California, Benjamin and his family move to a new house with an adjoining zoo that needs repairs and renovations. With the help of the zoo's employees and some other people, they manage to renovate and open the zoo to the public.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington follows the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear with a passion for all things British, who travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he begins to realise that city life is not all he had imagined - until he meets the kindly Brown family, who read the label around his neck ('Please look after this bear. Thank you.') and offer him a temporary haven. It looks as though his luck has changed until this rarest of bears catches the eye of a museum taxidermist.

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Paddington is happily living with the Brown family in Windsor Gardens, where he becomes a popular member of the community. He finds a special book to give to his Aunt Lucy for her 100th birthday at Mr. Gruber's antique shop, and gets involved in a series of peculiar jobs to buy it.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: A small Wisconsin town becomes the center of political attention, when a Democrat strategist named Gary tries to help a retired Marine Colonel run for mayor.

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A hard-working small business owner and his two associates travel to Europe to close the most important deal of their lives. But what began as a routine business trip goes off the rails in every imaginable and unimaginable way.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Sixty-five million years ago, an alien race, the "Creators", implanted an alloy, "Transformium", into the Earth. It is now excavated, along with the melted bodies of illegally hunted Autobots and Decepticons, by KSI industries to build transformer drones, like Galvatron. Optimus Prime, long in hiding from this hunt, emerges to defend his friends and face Galvatron who turns out to be an old enemy.(n)

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: A small Wisconsin town becomes the center of political attention, when a Democrat strategist named Gary tries to help a retired Marine Colonel run for mayor.(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Bud Fox is an ambitious stockbroker who's willing to do whatever it takes to get to the top. He meets the legendary Wall Street player Gordon Gekko who gets him involved in his illegal schemes.(n)

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Valerie Plame is tracking a uranium deal that is rumored that Iraq will buy it from Niger, but the war in Niger erupts, and the US war on Iraq starts anyway. Her opposition husband Joe Wilson writes an article exposing the lie of the US administration, and the authorities avenge him.(n)

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.(n)

programme.title: Bombshell
programme.desc: A group of women try to take on Fox News head, Roger Ailes, due to his administration policy and the toxic male culture he is spreading in the network.(n)

programme.title: Miss Sloane
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist finds herself in the fight of her life when she puts her strategic talents into trying to push for legislation to control guns. But as the powerful gun lobby rises up against her, she discovers that she is going against people who are willing to go to any lengths to stop her.(n)

programme.title: The Young Karl Marx
programme.desc: The story of a young Karl Marx after being exiled with his wife in 1844 to Paris, where he meets Friedrich Engels. Through a series of strikes, demonstrations, and battles, the duo leads the working-class to a new age.

programme.title: Uncle Drew
programme.desc: When Dax has trouble winning the Rucker Classic street ball tournament in Harlem, his desperation to make up for his past loss leads him to enlist the help of Uncle Drew, an elderly basketball legend whose solution to help Dax includes getting his old team back together for one last hurrah.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga : Eclipse
programme.desc: With a vengeful vampire preparing for an attack on the Cullens, Bella and Edward clash over the former's wish to be turned as tensions rise between Edward and Jacob, threatening to give rise to the old enmity between werewolves and vampires.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
programme.desc: After Katniss Everdeen (Jennifer Lawrence) became the symbol of the revolution against the tyrannical Capitol system, and with the return of Peeta Mellark (Josh Hutcherson) to his comrades, Katniss with her revolutionary comrades enter a final battle against the Capitol and President Snow.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: In a mythical world, the personal revenge of the barbarian warrior Conan turns into an epic battle against all of his adversaries and enormous monsters, at the heart of impossible odds, becoming the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from the domination of supernatural evil forces.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: This film takes place in 1970s London; Terry Leather is a salesmen, happily married with children, and few secrets to keep. When an old friend, Martine Love, offers up a scheme to make some quick cash, Terry finds himself unable to refuse. With the help of a carefully selected crew including Kevin Swain and David Shilling, they rent a warehouse on Baker Street and begin tunneling to the nearby Loyd Bank. With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained.

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is obsessed with martial arts and kung-fu movies. One day he discovers an ancient stick that used to belong to the Monkey King, and when he holds it, he is transported back to ancient China.

programme.title: Life on the Line
programme.desc: The film revolves around a crew working in the most difficult circumstances, repairing electrical wiring but things become harder when they face a deadly storm.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss finds herself in District 13 after she literally shatters the game forever, faced with a decision that could sway the fate of her nation. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss reluctantly becomes the symbol of mass revolution against the autocratic Capitol.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: Tommy goes back to his hometown to be trained by his ex-boxer, alcoholic father for a big boxing competition and when the time comes, he finds himself face-to-face with his estranged older brother, Brendan, in the ring.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
programme.desc: After Katniss Everdeen (Jennifer Lawrence) became the symbol of the revolution against the tyrannical Capitol system, and with the return of Peeta Mellark (Josh Hutcherson) to his comrades, Katniss with her revolutionary comrades enter a final battle against the Capitol and President Snow.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In the distant future, robots are created to help humans with their daily tasks. Detective Del Spooner begins to investigate the murder of a leading robotics scientist and discovers that a robot named Sonny is involved. He has to protect the fate of humans, and reconcile between them and the robots.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fearing an inevitable defeat under Hitler's leadership, a group of German politicians and military officers plan a political coup and attempt to assassinate Hitler during World War II.

programme.title: Fire with Fire
programme.desc: One day after a grueling day at work, fireman Jeremy Coleman witnesses the murder of a store owner and his son. Coleman is forced to testify against the ruthless criminal Hagen. He enters the Witness Protection Program as he tries to save himself and his loved ones.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A professional driver who works in criminal operations, is charged with transporting the daughter of a dangerous Chinese crime lord.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Two decades after the events of Jurassic Park, a new theme park is open for business, but history has a habit of repeating itself, when a transgenic dinosaur escapes from its enclosure and creates havoc on the island of Isla Nublar.

programme.title: The Tracker
programme.desc: Aiden Hakansson decides to travel to a deserted village in Italy where his wife and daughter were kidnapped fifteen years earlier, as he sets out to seek revenge on those responsible.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.

programme.title: Life on the Line
programme.desc: The film revolves around a crew working in the most difficult circumstances, repairing electrical wiring but things become harder when they face a deadly storm.

programme.title: 24 Hours to Live
programme.desc: After an experimental surgery that brings him back to life for one day, assassin killer, Travis Conrad has 24 hours to work with the team of women who killed him, seek revenge from the crime organization that was responsible for the murder of his wife and child, and seek personal redemption.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: On the eve of the fall of the Berlin wall, spy Lorraine Broughton goes on a mission to bring down the spy network that killed an undercover agent for an unknown reason.

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: (Jamal Malik) a poor youngster who grew up in Mumbai, becomes the contestant on the Indian version of (Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?). He is arrested for suspected cheating on the program. While he's interrogated ,the events show his difficult history that explains why he answers the questions.

programme.title: A Million Little Pieces
programme.desc: A young writer who reached rock bottom because of his drug addiction checks himself into a treatment facility in Minnesota to recover.

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: After the Japanese surrender at the end of World War II, General Fellers is assigned to determine if Emperor Hirohito will be hanged as a war criminal. Affecting his decision,is his search to find Aya, an exchange student he met years earlier in the U.S.

programme.title: Puncture
programme.desc: Mike is a young and talented lawyer who takes on a complicated and unconventional case, where a nurse is injected with a tainted needle. As he gets deeper in the case, he finds out that it is related to prominent figures in society.

programme.title: A Million Little Pieces
programme.desc: A young writer who reached rock bottom because of his drug addiction checks himself into a treatment facility in Minnesota to recover.

programme.title: Rosie
programme.desc: Forced into homelessness when their landlord sells their house, a mother desperately tries to shield her children from the harsh reality of their situation as she tries to find a place for them to stay.

programme.title: Killer Joe
programme.desc: After he finds himself shackled by debt, drug dealer Chris finds that his only way out is by killing his mother to get the insurance sum. Chris seeks help from Killer Joe, who is a professional assassin and a detective, to achieve what he seeks.

programme.title: A Million Little Pieces
programme.desc: A young writer who reached rock bottom because of his drug addiction checks himself into a treatment facility in Minnesota to recover.

programme.title: Run The Race
programme.desc: Zach's plans for a better future are derailed when a serious knee injury forces him off the football field. As his brother steps in to try and fill the void, the bonds of brotherhood are put to the test.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: The bohemian artist Robert travels to Tuscany with his estranged son Jack to fix the family's dilapidated house in order to sell it. But as they attempt to fix the house, they also mend their strained relationship.
